messages.message: @Charles going to set up some time

Also take a look at this wiki (https://instabase.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/ENG/pages/2990702595/Debugging+live+requests+using+your+crafting+environment) @demetr.starshov wrote for debugging live requests on your crafting env - I think it's helpful to understand how to get the data we need
were you guys able to figure this out during your meeting?

yeah so, Sayan recommended I use the debugger to see what further info I can get from the request or any results payload. So I'll do that later today to fill in what I can

more complicated changes that require some restructuring of passed down metadata from some internal grpc calls will be separated out

i just looked at some of your changes, and please don't add variables if they aren't actually passed into the API! this makes the API code more confusing
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72289#discussion_r2280126529
• https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/72289#discussion_r2280128282

in AI Hub, creating/updating an app always happens via `POST /api/v2/aihub/build/projects/app` and `PUT /api/v2/aihub/build/projects/app`

similarly, deleting an app always happens via `DELETE /api/v2/aihub/build/projects/app`

so all of these audit logs are in `aihub_build.py`, not `apps.py` (typo in your original message? i think your PR changing the correct files)
apps don't live in a workspace, so `workspace_id` and `workspace_name` don't make sense for audit logs for creating/updating/deleting apps
ah ok and that would explain why it only shows up for app runs...

and thanks for looking it over! deleted all the logging in apps, the only thing missing for now then is the app_id for create, update, and delete, but that can be cherry picked. I don't want to make more changes as this needs to be merged today
so i'll spend the rest of my time today testing
Should we add coverage for deleting App Runs?
Ooh good suggestion! Can you ask in <#C08R268JNN5|> and tag Josh to ask?
